system.notes: Must mount on Port/Starboard. Holds up to 6 squadrons although only 2 can be prepared to launch at any one time. If component is ever unpowered, becomes depressurised. Engages large security hatches when travelling through the warp.

Notes: Must mount on Port/Starboard. Holds up to 6 squadrons although only 2 can be prepared to launch at any one time. If component is ever unpowered, becomes depressurised. Engages large security hatches when travelling through the warp.
